metadata.title: CVE-2022-3078 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.16-rc6. There is alack of check after calling vzalloc() and lack of free after allocation indrivers/media/test-drivers/vidtv/vidtv_s302m.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3078` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1007-oracle - 5.15.0-1007.9~20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux-oracle-5.15 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1007.9~20.04.1').
